description: Matsuri has come to Aono`s house and go into a conversation about who Yorito chooses to go with — one of them to a different place, the other whom he has asked a favor from. The two Yaka begin a battle in the wrecked construction area while Yorito waits in an old theater. Just when Matsuri is able to deliver the final blow, the old camera in the theater comes on and displays the sky.

titles.title: The Boundary Between Light and Dark
